name: electricmaxxx/rest-bundle
description: My REST bundle for the cmf - a little sandbox

suggest.doctrine/phpcr-odm: To enable support for the PHPCR ODM documents
suggest.doctrine/phpcr-bundle: To enable support for the PHPCR ODM documents
suggest.doctrine/orm: To enable support for the ORM entities
suggest.symfony-cmf/content-bundle: To optionally use the configured value for 'content_basepath' from the CoreBundle
suggest.symfony-cmf/core-bundle: To use the provided Doctrine\Phpcr documents and for easier configuration
suggest.sonata-project/doctrine-phpcr-admin-bund: To provide an admin interface for the PHPCR ODM documents
